name: Securenext Software Corp
description:
SECURENEXT SOFTWARES is a highly structured, performance oriented and customer centric organization. In SNS we follow the concept of development and sustainability to bring about a change in quality of services and business. With offices in Clovis, California and in Chennai, India we have the right inputs and expertise and are in tune with global marketing and business strategy. The organization is blessed with talented employees who are bubbling with energy to excel in their field.
The core team consists of computer programmers, network administrators, database administrators, business analyst, web designers and content management specialist. SNS has a rich experience of 5 years in providing software solution. Customer Satisfaction It is very important since it is the element which drives us to achieve great heights. We value our client's suggestions and thoughts as they provide us vital information for creating a client centric services and solutions. We want to emotionally and logically connect with our customers and clients as this helps to fine tune the inter-operatabiltiy procedure. International Presence We have an office at Clovis, California in U.S. and a office in Chennai, India. We operate through global standards and settings and the protocols followed by us is world class and best in the industry.
